item.title: About Cloudprober
item.description: Posted on Oct 05, 2023 by Manu Garg ‐ 3 min read Origin # I started building Cloudprober in 2016, while I was at Google, leading the Cloud Networking SRE team there. Google Cloud was just beginning to grow big, and we were still grappling with some early growth issue. Our biggest problem was that our customers were discovering problems before us, which resulted in bad experience for our customers and huge time sink for my team in debugging those issues.
